com.quantcomponents.algo
Interface IStockDatabaseTradingAgentBindingManager

All Known Subinterfaces:
IStockDatabaseTradingManager
public interface IStockDatabaseTradingAgentBindingManager

Interface to manage algorithm binding, specific for strategies based on stocks

See Also:
ITradingHierarchyManager, IStockDatabase

Method Summary
 TradingAgentBindingHandle createBinding(TradingAgentConfigurationHandle tradingAgentConfigurationHandle, Map<String,IStockDatabase> inputStockDatabase, String name)
          Binds a specific algorithm to a series of stock database inputs The input stock dabatases must be mapped by the input names found in ISeriesProcessorFactory.getInputSeriesNames()
 Map<String,IStockDatabase> getBindingInputStockDatabases(TradingAgentBindingHandle bindingHandle)
          Retrieves the input stock database from a binding
 void removeBinding(TradingAgentBindingHandle bindingHandle)
          Removes a binding
 

Method Detail

createBinding

TradingAgentBindingHandle createBinding(TradingAgentConfigurationHandle tradingAgentConfigurationHandle,
                                        Map<String,IStockDatabase> inputStockDatabase,
                                        String name)
Binds a specific algorithm to a series of stock database inputs The input stock dabatases must be mapped by the input names found in ISeriesProcessorFactory.getInputSeriesNames()

Parameters:
tradingAgentConfigurationHandle - handle of the configured algorithm
inputStockDatabase - the stock databases tagged by input name
name - a readable name to be shown in the UI
Returns:
a handle to the binding created

getBindingInputStockDatabases

Map<String,IStockDatabase> getBindingInputStockDatabases(TradingAgentBindingHandle bindingHandle)
Retrieves the input stock database from a binding

Parameters:
bindingHandle - the handle of the binding
Returns:
the map of input as creates in the previous method

removeBinding

void removeBinding(TradingAgentBindingHandle bindingHandle)
Removes a binding

Parameters:
bindingHandle - the handle of the binding to remove
